definition: supporting a wife and children/dragged down by having a family to feed
to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: After we have kids, being the parent of successful children is often added to the list.
sentences.chinese: 拖兒帶女後，又加了一條，要做成功孩子的家長。
